org.flowvisor.config

Interface FlowSpace

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FVAppConfig
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlowSpaceImpl

    public interface FlowSpace
extends FVAppConfig
    A proxy interface for the flowspace db table. It handles all the logistics to get flow rules in and out of the data repository.
    Author:
    ash

    • Method Detail

      • getFlowMap

        FlowMap getFlowMap()
                   throws ConfigError
        Reads the flowspace from the data repository and returns it
        Returns:
        a flowmap
        Throws:
        ConfigError - an error occurred while reading the data repository.

      • setFlowMap

        void setFlowMap(FlowMap map)
                throws ConfigError
        Writes the flowmap to the data repository. Notifies the flowspace change!
        Parameters:
        map - the flowmap to be written
        Throws:
        ConfigError - an error occurred during the write process.

      • removeRule

        void removeRule(int id)
                throws ConfigError
        Removes a single FlowSpaceRule Does not Notify of the flowspace change!
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the rule to remove
        Throws:
        ConfigError - if this rule is not found.

      • addRule

        int addRule(FlowEntry fe)
            throws ConfigError
        Add the rule to the FlowSpace Does not Notify of the flowspace change!
        Parameters:
        entry - the rule to add
        Returns:
        id of the rule
        Throws:
        ConfigError

      • saveFlowSpace

        void saveFlowSpace(java.lang.String sliceName)
                   throws ConfigError
        Preserve the flowspace for future usage.
        Parameters:
        sliceName - - flowspace for sliceName will be saved.
        Throws:
        ConfigError
